name: The Year Three Thousand
description:
THE YEAR THREE-THOUSAND

This is the future world where Mecha-Robots live peacefully.

There is only one plant left in the world- The Sacred Sapling, which powers every existing thing.

But the Evil Organization has stolen it and now it is poisoned, while everyone including them has turned into scary round objects.

Only you can save it, and the current world!

It is not as easy as it seems.

Good Luck!

MOVE USING: W, A, S, D OR ARROW KEYS AND SPACEBAR

NOTES:

Currently playable in PC.

Note that there are some bugs (also known as features)

This game has only stage 1 currently, out of the total 7 stages to be added soon :).

Only one external Unity Store Asset was used in making this game.

THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR THE JAME GAM GAME JAM #21
